name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Oscar F. SHARP, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Oscar F. SHARP, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Judson E. Ruch, Craley, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Richard H. Horn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 88
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Oscar F. SHARP, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 20, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
Reargument Denied July 21, 1980.
Judson E. Ruch, Craley, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Richard H. Horn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
